label: UV Tile
tooltip:
Creates a proceedural UV map that can be used to check the UVs on any object. It is normalised in U and V so using a colour sample with allow you to
check the UV location of any point on the model. it is STRONGLY recommended that you only output to Square formats (1:1 aspect ratio)
originalAuthor: Rafal Kaniewski credits to Tahl for the idea
